title: Omnium Opens Titanium Pre-Order February 1st
content:
Omnium, makers of some of the finest cargo bikes in the world, will open its first On-Demand pre-order window of 2025 for Titanium V3 IR versions of the Cargo, Mini-Max (pictured above under this handsome bloke), Mini, and CXC models. The window opens Saturday, February 1st at 10:00 CET and closes Friday, February 14th @ 23:59 CET.

Omnium anticipates the frame arrival date at its Copenhagen HQ to be six months from when the order window closes, where orders will be processed as usual thereafter.

Be ready February 1st at Omnium.

The post Omnium Opens Titanium Pre-Order February 1st appeared first on The Radavist.
author: John Watson
